Course Description: The goal of this course is to provide fundamental understanding of multi-agent systems. We will study different multi-agent system techniques for decision-making. These techniques are general and have wide range of applications like e-commerce, robotics, air-traffic control, etc. In this course, we will use multi-robot systems domain as the targeted application domain for assignments and final project. The course has both theoretical and implementation parts. From theoretical perspective, all the major multi-agent system concepts and design techniques will be studied through lectures, presentations and discussions. The implementation component is in the form of assignments and final project.
